detail_desc: Slightly longer jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high collar, zip at the top, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Shorts in glossy, pleated jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and short, wide legs with laser-cut edges at the hems.
Shorts in glossy, pleated jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and short, wide legs with laser-cut edges at the hems.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline front and back and a slit at the back.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline front and back and a slit at the back.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline front and back and a slit at the back.
Calf-length skirt in silk with a high, smocked waist. Unlined.

Short jacket in a cashmere blend with a brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the top with a concealed press-stud, and concealed pockets in the side seams. Straight cut with gentle draping. Unlined.

Short jacket in a cashmere blend with a brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the top with a concealed press-stud, and concealed pockets in the side seams. Straight cut with gentle draping. Unlined.
Short dress in a crisp cotton weave with a V-neck, flounced wrapover front, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs and narrow ties at the waist. Lined skirt.
Wide shirt in soft, supple leather with a pointed collar, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Visible seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Wide shirt in soft, supple leather with a pointed collar, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Visible seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Wide shirt in soft, supple leather with a pointed collar, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Visible seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Long jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and high slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in a sturdy herringbone weave containing some wool with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Short, high-waisted skirt in leather with decorative seams, a concealed zip in one side and a raw-edge hem. Lined.
Wide maxi dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.
Wide maxi dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.
Wide maxi dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-patterned knit containing some wool with a fluffy finish. Stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Ankle-length circular skirt in softly draping jersey with a high, elasticated waist and a high slit.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs, two pairs with synthetic resin pendants. Length from approx. 3.5 cm to 5 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a soft, jacquard-patterned knit containing some wool with a fluffy finish. High waist with a ribbed waistband, and a slit at the back of the hem.

Wide, ankle-length dress in softly draping, patterned silk with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a gathered seam at the hips and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Lightweight boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Trousers in soft wool twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, discreet side pockets and a jetted back pocket with a button. Low crotch and straight, wide legs with creases front and back.

Trousers in soft, supple leather with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and straight legs with seams above the knees and raw-edge hems. Partly lined.
Double-layered scarf in patterned silk. Size 9.5x100 cm.
Double-layered scarf in patterned silk. Size 9.5x100 cm.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen. Decorative gathers on the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back, a seam at the hips and a seam with a flounce at the hem. V-neck underdress in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with narrow shoulder straps that have a concealed press-stud allowing the underdress to be removed.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
Triangular scarf in a soft, felted wool and cashmere blend with fringing along the bottom edge. Size 100x200 cm.
Calf-length leather skirt with a high waist, concealed zip in one side, decorative stitching, and a slit at one side of the front. Half-lined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in patterned chiffon with a V-neck, narrow smocking at the shoulders, under the bust and at the back, and short puff sleeves. Shorter, V-neck jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.
Fabric belt with D-rings. Width 3 cm.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 14x30x45 cm. The polyester content of the backpack is recycled.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 14x30x45 cm. The polyester content of the backpack is recycled.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 14x30x45 cm. The polyester content of the backpack is recycled.

Backpack in woven fabric with a handle at the top and adjustable, padded shoulder straps. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Padded back plate and base. Lined. Size 14x30x45 cm. The polyester content of the backpack is recycled.
Metal hoop earrings with a small plastic bead. Length 3.8 cm.

Leggings in soft, supple leather with a thin cotton lining. High waist with concealed elastication, a zip at one side and legs with decorative seams and raw-edge hems.

Calf-length skirt in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with gathered, covered elastication at the waist. Inset panels at the sides to create draping and volume, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.

Calf-length skirt in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and silk weave with gathered, covered elastication at the waist. Inset panels at the sides to create draping and volume, and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbed cuffs. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material.
Body in jersey with a sheen. Sewn-in wrapover upper section with a concealed press-stud and short cap sleeves. Lower section in soft microfibre with laser-cut edges and press-studs at the crotch.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

Straight-cut, short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and an open chest pocket.

Soft, non-wired bras in cotton jersey and lace with padded, triangular cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.

Set with a long-sleeved wrapover bodysuit, pair of leggings and hat in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the sides and crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a foldover hem.
